Package ohos.agp.animation.styledsolutions

Class GravitationalClick

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.animation.styledsolutions.GravitationalClick

  • public class GravitationalClick
extends Object
    Implements a bouncing animation effect on a component upon a touch.
    Since:
    5

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int EFFECT_DEFALT
      A click effect, with given scale and other parameters are set to default
      static int EFFECT_HEAVY
      A Heavy click effect, best click effect for large-sized items
      static int EFFECT_LIGHT
      A Light click effect, best click effect for small-sized items
      static int EFFECT_MIDDLE
      A Medium click effect, best click effect for medium-sized items

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GravitationalClick​()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static AnimatorProperty getActionDownAnimation​(Component component, int type)
      Generates an animator property (scaling effect) for a component, corresponding to an ACTION_DOWN event (that is, when the user touches the screen).
      static AnimatorProperty getActionDownAnimation​(Component component, int type, float destScale)
      Generates an animator property (scaling effect) for a component while specifying the scaling percentage, corresponding to an ACTION_DOWN event (that is, when the user touches the screen).
      static AnimatorProperty getActionUpAnimation​(Component component, int type)
      Generates an animator property for a component, corresponding to an ACTION_UP or ACTION_CANCEL event, so as to restore the original size of the component (with the scaling percentage being 1F).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • GravitationalClick

        public GravitationalClick​()

    • Method Detail

      • getActionDownAnimation

        public static AnimatorProperty getActionDownAnimation​(Component component,
                                                      int type)
        Generates an animator property (scaling effect) for a component, corresponding to an ACTION_DOWN event (that is, when the user touches the screen).
        Parameters:
        component - Indicates the target component.
        type - Indicates the scaling (bouncing) effect, which can be EFFECT_HEAVY, EFFECT_MIDDLE, or EFFECT_LIGHT.
        Returns:
        Returns the AnimatorProperty object.
        Since:
        5

      • getActionDownAnimation

        public static AnimatorProperty getActionDownAnimation​(Component component,
                                                      int type,
                                                      float destScale)
        Generates an animator property (scaling effect) for a component while specifying the scaling percentage, corresponding to an ACTION_DOWN event (that is, when the user touches the screen).
        Parameters:
        component - Indicates the target component.
        type - Indicates the scaling (bouncing) effect, which can be EFFECT_HEAVY, EFFECT_MIDDLE, or EFFECT_LIGHT.
        destScale - Indicates the scaling percentage, for example, 0.95F (meaning that the component is scaled to 95% of its original size).
        Returns:
        Returns the AnimatorProperty object.
        Since:
        5

      • getActionUpAnimation

        public static AnimatorProperty getActionUpAnimation​(Component component,
                                                    int type)
        Generates an animator property for a component, corresponding to an ACTION_UP or ACTION_CANCEL event, so as to restore the original size of the component (with the scaling percentage being 1F).
        Parameters:
        component - Indicates the target component.
        type - Indicates the scaling (bouncing) effect, which can be EFFECT_HEAVY, EFFECT_MIDDLE, or EFFECT_LIGHT.
        Returns:
        Returns the AnimatorProperty object.
        Since:
        5
